md:
giải nghĩa từ "board" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Board (noun) - Bảng, Ban, Đội ngũ
	+ Meaning: A flat piece of material, such as wood or plastic, used for a particular purpose.
	+ Example: The board of directors made a decision to invest in the new project.
	+ Related words: blackboard, chessboard, scoreboard, surfboard

* Board (verb) - Đi lên, Đi tàu
	+ Meaning: To get on a bus, train, plane, or ship.
	+ Example: We boarded the plane and took off an hour later.
	+ Related words: on board, board pass, boarding card

* Board (verb) - Cung cấp chỗ ở
	+ Meaning: To provide food and lodging for someone.
	+ Example: The hotel will board us for the duration of our stay.
	+ Related words: room and board, boarding house, boarding school
html:
giải nghĩa từ "board" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Board (noun) - Bảng, Ban, Đội ngũ

    • Meaning: A flat piece of material, such as wood or plastic, used for a particular purpose.
    • Example: The board of directors made a decision to invest in the new project.
    • Related words: blackboard, chessboard, scoreboard, surfboard

  • Board (verb) - Đi lên, Đi tàu

    • Meaning: To get on a bus, train, plane, or ship.
    • Example: We boarded the plane and took off an hour later.
    • Related words: on board, board pass, boarding card

  • Board (verb) - Cung cấp chỗ ở

    • Meaning: To provide food and lodging for someone.
    • Example: The hotel will board us for the duration of our stay.
    • Related words: room and board, boarding house, boarding school
